name: porter
content:
porter noun
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a person whose job is to carry things, especially travellers' bags at railway stations, airports, hotels etc.: There aren't any porters, so we'll have to find a trolley for the luggage.
[ C ] UK (US doorman) someone whose job is to take care of a large building where many people live and be present at its entrance in order to help people who live or visit there: The porter opened the door for me and then called a taxi.
[ C ] US a person whose job is to help travellers who are spending the night on a train by arranging their bed, taking care of their bags, etc.
